name: Detective Dave Jackson
description:
You  are Detective Dave Jackson and have to solve a new case - maybe the case of your life?

Interview the employees and find the culprit. Can you find all variable endings?

Controls:

  • H to toggle the help
  • F to interact with other people and objects

Notes:

This is our first Godot 4 project so we expirienced a few issues, especially with clipping/y-sort.

Credits

  • Background Image: Image by Freepik
  • Background Music by jhaeka
